bytes.help: Sum of all virtual transaction sizes as defined in BIP 141. Differs from actual serialized size because witness data is discounted.
bytes.name: mempoolbytes

usage.help: Total memory usage for the mempool.
usage.name: mempoolusage

maxmempool.help: Maximum memory usage for the mempool.
maxmempool.name: maxmempool

mempoolminfee.help: Minimum fee rate in BTC/kB for tx to be accepted. Is the maximum of minrelaytxfee and minimum mempool fee.
mempoolminfee.name: mempoolminfee

minrelaytxfee.help: Current minimum relay fee for transactions.
minrelaytxfee.name: minrelaytxfee
